text:
@realDonaldTrump We’re going to hit #Trump today after seeing what he ISN’T doing with #coronavirus. “PP Act” all the way. No surprise to anyone in the US as to what he’s been doing - NOTHING. Will have a big price to pay in November 2020!

#KushnerForPrison2021 #TrumpForPrison2021 #GOP #MAGA
